AI Description: PyOpenCL lets you access GPUs and other massively parallel compute devices by using the Open Computing Language (OpenCL). The package is built on top of the OpenCL C API and enables Python scripts to easily make full use of compute devices like GPUs, TPUs, and other accelerators.
Core Features: Provides Python Bindings For Opencl Api, Enables Parallel Computing On Gpus & Other Devices, Integration With Numpy Arrays For Data Manipulation, Supports Heterogeneous Computing Environments
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
